overview: Act presents some of the main historical styles in European painting of the naked human figure. Changes in the styles of painting the naked human figure are presented, from baroque and rococo through classicism, romanticism, realism, impressionism, modernism and post-modernism. There is no conventional narration in this animated movie; instead the plot is inspired by the history of European painting as seen and practiced by an artist—the author of this animated movie.
title: Act
